DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of different distractive auditory stimuli (fast, slow and preferred) on 6 Minute Walking Test (6MWT) and the measured parameters (dyspnea, heart rate, oxygen saturation) in healthy children.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Music on 6 Minutes Walking Distance in Healthy Children
DOC.criteria: the participation to the physical education program after the annual medical investigation a lung disease an overweight a motor disability based on parent's answers to a questionnaire
